posts.title: (USA-NC-Concord) Care Partner-Post Surgical Care I FT Nights/CHS-NE
posts.text:
Carolinas Healthcare System Care Partner-Post Surgical Care I FT Nights/CHS-NE in Concord , North Carolina 
Care Partner-Post Surgical Care I FT Nights/CHS-NE 
Apply now » 
Location: Concord, NC, US, 28025 
Company: Carolinas HealthCare System 
Department Name: NSG - Post Surgical Care 1 
Location: CHS Northeast 
Performs patient care and technical skills within established standards of care, protocols, policies and procedures. 
Essential Functions 
Transports patients with assistance or ambulator to the department and identifies patients using two methods of identification. 
Provides patient education of procedure and demonstrates knowledge of protocols and necessary equipment. 
Processes EKG from order entry to report generation and archival while meeting 48 hour turn-around time. 
Monitors incomplete procedure list and checks machines routinely. 
Provides procedural expertise, education and serves as preceptor. 
Maintains necessary supplies/knowledge for repairs along with orderly and complete records. 
Provides nursing care activities including toiletry needs, vital signs, prep of patients and other duties as assigned. 
Physical Requirements 
Moderate degree of physical effort with frequent reaching, pulling, and lifting of up to 35 lbs. Travel throughout hospital campuses. General hospital environment with frequent exposure to chemicals, pathogens, blood and body fluids. Frequent computer utilization. Based on the physical requirements for this position all applicants for this position are required to undergo a physical ability test as a condition of employment. 
Education, Experience and Certifications 
High School Diploma or GED required. Current NA I listing with the Division of Facility Services required. Basic Life Support for Healthcare Provider (BLS HCP) from AHA required. 
At Carolinas HealthCare System, our patients, communities and teammates are at the center of everything we do. Our commitment to diversity and inclusion allows us to deliver care that is superior in quality and compassion across our network of more than 900 care locations. 
As a leading, innovative health system, we promote an environment where differences are valued and integrated into our workforce. Our culture of inclusion and cultural competence allows us to achieve our goals and deliver the best possible experience to patients and the communities we serve. 
Posting Notes: Not Applicable

thread.section_title: 7 Low-Cost Ways to Market Your Company – Teri Crawford Business Tips
thread.title: 7 Low-Cost Ways to Market Your Company
thread.title_full: 7 Low-Cost Ways to Market Your Company

posts.author: Teri Crawford
posts.title: 7 Low-Cost Ways to Market Your Company
posts.text:
Guest Article 
Marketing your own business can be time consuming and costly. As a business owner you have limited time with often a tight budget. Fortunately, you don’t have to spend thousands of dollars to execute a marketing plan. Below are seven low-cost ways to market your company without forfeiting quality.
Social Media The three main social platforms you can use to promote your social media for free are Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram. All you need to get started is a solid social media plan, content writing skills, and/or video making skills. However, you can always use your staff or interns for this if they have a higher skillset. Just remember, quality content counts. A single post on your social media profiles can make the difference between hundreds of clicks, comments, and shares versus none.
Blogging Writing blog posts or press releases that interest your customers is another great way to promote your business online. Plus, the more attention your articles get, the more traffic it can drive back to your website and advertise your company. If you’re a real estate company, you can write anything from securing home loans to finding the perfect home in your area. Remember, the more specific you make the topic of the article, the more it can market your company. You should also include a short blurb about you and your business with your article to allow potential customers to know how to find you.
Referral Program Word of mouth is still the most popular marketing tools used for business, large and small. Creating your company’s own referral program is a great way to reward customers and get them talking about how professional your business is. Plus, you don’t have to spend a lot for customer rewards. You’ll be surprised how excited people get for small discounts, free t-shirts, or even movie passes.
Email Campaigns Sending out weekly or monthly emails to your valued customers is a great way to market new products or simply tell your consumers how much they mean to your company. Plus, offering special deals in return for reading the email is a great way to reward your customers. However, make sure that you are providing helpful content to your readers. You don’t want to message your customer too much do that they unsubscribe from your list. The last thing they want is to feel pressured into buying a product or be bombarded with irrelevant news from your company. Make sure to keep it as light and interesting as you can.
Use Promotional Products Using branded promotional products is a great way to boost brand awareness and ensure potential clients remember your business. Give them away for free to potential customers and clients or use them to draw a crowd at business conferences. Whenever they see the product, they will remember your company and what you do. You can remain in the forefront of their mind when looking for or recommending a company like yours, which will surely increase sales.
Cross Promote When using cross-promotion, also known as buddy marketing, you create an agreement with another business to promote each other. For example, you may agree to post an ad for the other company in your email newsletter if they agree to do the same. This is a fantastic way to spread the reach of your business and reach an entirely new audience.
It might be in your best interest to seek out companies in the same industry, though not ones that offer the same sort of product. This way, you can run joint promotions. For example, if you teach art classes, you can cross promote with an art supply store and run a contest together. This is less expensive than running a promotion on your own and will require less effort on your part since you will be sharing responsibility and the cost.
Brand Your Communications Every document you send out, both physical and digital, should be branded with your logo and pertinent company information. Yes, this is for more than just your business cards. Every document that you send out should contain your company name, logo, website, and contact information. You can even add your slogan onto your documents to be even more memorable. This info should be placed in the letterhead on digital and physical correspondences. You should also update your email signature to contain this information, too. You can even add links to your company’s social media profiles so your clients can connect with you there, too. Be sure to take every promotional opportunity given to you.
About the author :
Ryan Bridges is a contributing writer for Alamo Tees & Advertising . In his spare time, he enjoys spending time with his family and running.
//smallbizlady.leadpages.net/leadbox-1508777521.js 
The post 7 Low-Cost Ways to Market Your Company appeared first on Succeed As Your Own Boss .

posts.author: 大鲍鲍22
posts.text:
就是女朋友外出 嗨皮 手机丢了，然后半夜打电话给男友说自己没手机空虚寂寞冷感觉自己被孤立没有安全感。男朋友安慰说现在这点也没办法明天下班去找她再做打算。第二天去找女友发现她手里有朋友的旧手机掉的手机说是有办法弥补，男友一听这情况那不美滋滋少了一堆繁琐的事……结果女友还是不开心不很生气（大概就是你不关心我，不安慰我，我不安逸了，你明明自己有个不用的旧手机也不知道拿来给我用！，你是不是不爱我了...就这意思），男友一听你丢手机不是我的锅呀！你要旧手机早说呀我也没想到被整的很懵逼也来了火（TM滴我拿来给你用不就好了吗）然后回家把旧手机拿来了..女友一看也道歉了说没有控制好自己..事后意外又发生了（呦有人要买我旧手机这个好）然后屁颠屁颠的找女友去了（亲爱滴，有人要买我旧手机放在你手机快到了，你把旧手机还我吧过了这家就不好说啦，我说真的这是记录...）女友一听好的..然后出去了回来拿着一步新手机，男友一看（你傻呀不是快到了吗 你怎么还去买这不是浪费钱吗？..）女友（***吧！我们结束了！）男友又懵了 什么 what 纳尼....自己丢手机怎么还把我摔了？！
我要上神拼 让我上神评好不好

thread.title: [转贴] 中国北斗导航系统 2020覆盖全球 - Good Articles to Share
thread.title_full: [转贴] 中国北斗导航系统 2020覆盖全球 - Good Articles to Share | I3investor

posts.author: Tan KW
posts.title: [转贴] 中国北斗导航系统 2020覆盖全球 - Good Articles to Share
posts.text:
（西昌6日讯）中国四川省西昌卫星发射中心周日晚7时45分，用长征三號乙运载火箭以「一箭双星」方式，成功发射第24颗、第25颗北斗导航卫星，预计在2020年完成北斗卫星导航系统全球组网。
综合中新社、《中国青年报》报导，这两颗卫星属於中圆地球轨道卫星，也是第一、二颗北斗三號组网卫星。卫星入轨后，接下来將展开测试及入网验证，適时对外提供服务。
当晚发射成功后，中国计划到2018年底前后，发射18颗北斗三號组网卫星，覆盖「一带一路」沿线地区；到2020年左右，发射30多颗组网卫星，实现全球服务能力。
北斗若於2020年覆盖全球，將是继美国全球定位系统（GPS）、欧洲伽利略（GALILEO）、俄罗斯格洛纳斯（GLONASS）后，第4个全球卫星导航系统。
中国航天科技集团五院北斗三號工程副总设计师谢军指出，建成后的北斗全球导航系统，將为民用用户免费提供约10公尺精度的定位服务、每秒0.2公尺的测速服务，精准度可与美国GPS卫星导航系统媲美。
中国於2000年底建成北斗一號系统，向境內提供服务；2012年底建成北斗二號系统，向亚太地区提供服务；预计2020年前后建成北斗三號系统，向全球提供服务。
中国是继美、俄之后，世界上第3个拥有自主卫星导航系统的国家。北斗三號採用更高性能的銣原子钟和氢原子钟，空间信號精度（SIS）优於0.5公尺，並將定位精度提升了一至2倍，达到2.5公尺至5公尺水准。
http://www.orientaldaily.com.my/s/219223

thread.title: So heimstark der SV Herbern ist, so schwach tritt er in der Fremde auf
thread.title_full: So heimstark der SV Herbern ist, so schwach tritt er in der Fremde auf

posts.author: Rainer Gudra
posts.title: So heimstark der SV Herbern ist, so schwach tritt er in der Fremde auf
posts.text: So heimstark der SV Herbern ist, so schwach tritt er in der Fremde auf Kreispokal-Hit vorverlegt So heimstark der SV Herbern ist, so schwach tritt er in der Fremde auf 07.11.17 10:40 + © Gudra Zuhause jubelt es sich am schönsten: Marcel Scholtysik freut sich am Sonntag über seinen Treffer zum 1:0 gegen Altenberge. Es leitete den sechsten Heimsieg in dieser Saison ein. © Gudra Herbern - Der 5:1-Erfolg des SV Herbern am Sonntag in der Fußball-Landesliga (4) gegen den TuS Altenberge war nicht nur vom Ergebnis her herausragend, sondern auch von der Leistung. Denn die starken Gäste verlangten den Blau-Gelben spielerisch und taktisch eine Menge ab. Bemerkenswert: Es war der sechste Sieg des SVH in dieser Spielzeit auf eigenem Platz. 19 der 24 Heimpunkte holte die Elf von Holger Möllers bisher. Besser in diesem Ranking ist keine anderes Team in der Liga. Einzig Spitzenreiter Borussia Emsdetten mit dem 2:0-Sieg und der Werner SC beim 2:2 im Derby nahmen Punkte aus Herbern mit. Es ist einer der auffälligsten Unterschiede zum Verlauf der vergangenen Saison, an deren Ende der aktuell Fünfte nur dank des besseren Torverhältnisses gegenüber der TSG Dülmen und der SpVg Emsdetten die Liga gehalten hatte. 19 Punkte daheim, das sind jetzt schon vier mehr als am Ende der gesamten Spielzeit 2016/17. „Wir scheinen zuhause wieder eine Macht zu sein. Vielleicht spielen wir vor eigenem Publikum tatsächlich viel selbstbewusster“, sagt Holger Möllers, aber auch: „Das machen wir auswärts leider nicht.“ Dabei nervt den 46-Jährigen vor allem die 2:3-Pleite in Lengerich. „Wir dürfen also nicht alles schön reden, denn wir sind auch die zweitschlechteste Auswärtsmannschaft“, sagt Möllers, dessen Team am Sonntag bei der zweitschlechtesten Heimmannschaft antreten muss: SV Burgsteinfurt. Deshalb, und weil zum Abschluss am 19. November noch der VfL Senden am Siepen gastiert, „will ich nicht jetzt schon die Hinrunde bewerten. Da kann viel passieren“, sagt Möllers. Allerdings sprechen nach 13 Spieltagen acht Punkte mehr als im Vergleich zur vorherigen Spielzeit (23:15) für viel mehr Stabilität im Herberner Gefüge – trotz des krassen Missverhältnisses von Heimstärke und Auswärtsschwäche. „Deshalb müssen wir am Sonntag in Burgsteinfurt eine ebenso engagierte Leistung bringen wie gegen Altenberge. Die Erfahrung zeigt: Nimmst du einen Gang zurück, egal gegen wen, kassierst du eine Niederlage“, sagt Möllers. Er sieht viele Bausteine, die dafür sorgen, dass es – Stand heute – wohl keine weitere Zittersaison geben wird. Einer davon ist Angreifer Whitson Fereira Dos Santos, der im Sommer aus Drensteinfurt gekommen war. „Er hat am Sonntag kein Tor gemacht, aber wenn man sieht, wie er für die Mannschaft geackert hat...“, lobt Möllers. Oder Michael Schulte, der als unumstrittener Abwehrchef alle 13 Spiele über 90 Minuten auf dem Platz gestanden hat – als einziger Herberner. Seine makellose Spielbilanz verlor gegen Altenberge Thomas Eroglu, den eine „Bauchentscheidung“ des Trainers auf die Bank beförderte. Die größere körperliche Präsenz von Julian Trapp, zum Beispiel bei Standards, hatte Möller dafür als taktisches Stilmittel eingebracht. Für Gästetrainer Reckels war Trapp der „Man of the Match“– nicht ohne Grund, denn er erzielte nach einer Energieleistung das 2:1 und bereitete Schüttes Tor zum 3:1 vor, indem er die Kugel an der Mittellinie erkämpfte. Kämpferqualitäten erwartet der SVH-Trainer auch von Nikita Bassauer, der wie Schulte von der SG Sendenhorst kam. „An ihm werden wir in der Rückrunde noch viel Spaß haben“, sagt Möllers, „denn er schont sich nicht und geht dahin, wo es scheppert.“ Das führte allerdings zu einer längeren Pause wegen einer schweren Bänderdehnung. Aktuell wird Bassauer über die zweite Mannschaft wieder aufgebaut. „Die 90 Minuten da tun ihm richtig gut“, sagt Möllers, und auch die Trainingsleistungen stimmen: „Letzte Woche hat er richtig Gas gegeben und gezeigt: Ich will !“ „Insgesamt“, sagt Holger Möllers, „haben wir im Sommer viel Qualität verloren, aber auch viel Qualität hinzu bekommen. Die Neuzugänge haben schnell funktioniert.“ Insgesamt ergab sich so ein breiterer Kader, der – bis auf wenige Ausnahmen – auch von Verletzungen verschont geblieben ist. Auch die persönliche Entwicklung des Trainers dürfte ein wichtiger Baustein sein. „Und“, sagt Möllers, „im vergangenen Jahr war ich neu, musste mich erst an die Mannschaft gewöhnen. In diesem Sommer haben wir sie für meine Art, Fußball zu spielen, zusammengestellt.“ Pokal-Viertelfinale gegen Gievenbeck am Freitagabend Der SV Herbern zieht sein Viertelfinalspiel um den Pokal des Fußballkreises Münster um einen Tag auf Freitag, 24. November, vor. Anstoß am Siepen wird um 19.30 Uhr sein. Zu Gast ist Verbandsliga-Tabellenführer 1. FC Gievenbeck.

thread.title: Приятелството с Коста оставило Давид Луис на пейката
thread.title_full: Приятелството с Коста оставило Давид Луис на пейката

posts.title: Приятелството с Коста оставило Давид Луис на пейката
posts.text:
Приятелството с Коста оставило Давид Луис на пейката Антонио Конте наказва защитника си заради близки отношения с бившия футболист на "Челси" ЕМИСИИ 0 Снимка: Getty Images 
Защитникът на "Челси" Давид Луис стана жертва на близките си отношения с бившият играч на "сините от Лондон" - Диего Коста. Това твърди британското издание "Таймс". 
Къдрокосият футболист изгледа от резервната скамейка победата на своя тим срещу "Манчестър Юнайтед" в последния кръг на Висшата лига. Според информации в пресата бразилецът бил наказан през седмицата да не тренира заедно със съотборниците си. Нова комбинация между Аспиликуета и Мората възкреси "Челси" Шампионът на Англия победи "Манчестър Юнайтед" с 1:0 в дербито на 11-ия кръг от Висшата лига 
"Давид смята, че Конте го наказва заради приятелството му с Диего Коста, особено след като той се намеси в подкрепа на вече бившия си съотборник по време на скандала миналия сезон", казва близък до Луис пред "Таймс". 
Коста вече е футболист на "Атлетико" Мадрид и ще може да играе през следващия сезон, заради забраната за трансфери на "дюшекчиите". Той обаче се раздели с "Челси" със скандал, след като призна, че Конте му е съобщил, че няма да разчита на него със съобщение. Нападателят беше наказан да не тренира и да се готви самостоятелно, докато не си намери друг тим. 
Другата тиражирана версия в английските медии за статуса на резерва на защитника са новите правила на мениджъра след загубата с 0:3 от "Рома" в Шампионска лига. Източници в клуба твърдят, че Конте събрал футболистите след поражението и заявил, че никой от тях не може да се счита за сигурен титуляр. Луис останал на пейката заради несериозното си отношение към тренировъчния процес. Share

thread.title: (USA-TX-Austin) Data Analyst
thread.title_full: (USA-TX-Austin) Data Analyst

posts.title: (USA-TX-Austin) Data Analyst
posts.text:
1 
Main Street Renewal – Austin, TX 
Main Street Renewal is a private company focused on buying, renovating, and leasing across the country. We are very passionate about what we do. We care for each other, our partners, and our customers, fostering a culture of transparency, trust, and empowerment.​ We are determined to work smarter, utilizing great tools and technology to create an excellent experience for our residents. We are also driven to work harder and do what it takes to create exceptional outcomes.​ Our goal is to provide our residents a great house, easy lease experience, and attentive service so they can create a home they love. 
A day in the life of a Construction Analyst 
As our Data Analyst you will be instrumental in analyzing data discrepancies in our acquisition life-cycle and Data Warehouse and help identifying groups responsible for final fixes. Days and hours of work are Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5 p.m. Occasional evening and weekend work may be required as job duties demand. This position will report to the Director, Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence. 
Perform extensive data validation/quality assurance analysis within large datasets 
Build proactive data validation reporting and scripts to catch data integrity issues 
Ability to organize and lead meetings with business and operational data owners 
Coordinate and communicate between business users and the data warehouse organization, balancing requirements and resources to solve business problems 
Strong ability to troubleshoot and resolve data issues 
Strong TSQL ability 
Ability to build SSRS reports and/or Tableau reports as needed 
Work closely with engineering and operations to document business processes 
Work independently and with team members to understand database structure and business processes 
Identify opportunities to improve business processes using data and create reporting that meets business needs, including impactful and complex data visualizations solutions utilizing SSRS and/or Tableau 
Assist in the development of robust analytics dashboards in conjunction with the Data Consistency and Data Validation 
Evaluate and execute (extraction, transformation, and loading) ETL processes in Test 
What's in it for you? 
Collaborative team environment and the tools needed to be successful in your job 
Exceptional onboarding experience (we want you to succeed in your new role) 
Competitive benefits package, 401k with employer match, paid Holidays, and PTO. (We just keep on giving) 
Employee referral program (Get paid for referring your friends) 
Casual dress code environment (Enough Said) 
What you’ll need to have 
BA or BS in market research, marketing, psychology, statistics, math, computer science, physics or other related field 
2+ years of analytics, BI, or data warehousing experience with proven business analysis experience 
Excellent communication skills, significant experience in data analysis in either academic coursework or work experience 
High degree of comfort writing SQL code in the SQL Server environment 
Experience with SQL Server 2014/2016 
Some experience with Tableau versions 9 and 10 and/or willingness to learn 
Excellent presentation, writing, and Excel skills are a must 
Passionate about data, data validation, and analyzing business needs 
Just a few other things you should know 
Please note, this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice. 
This job operates in a professional office environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets and fax machines. 
The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. This is largely a sedentary role; however, some filing is required. This would require the ability to lift files, open filing cabinets and bend or stand on a stool as necessary. 
No travel is anticipated for this position 
At Main Street Renewal, we believe that our teammates are the foundation of our success. Come join our MSR family where we work smarter, work harder, and are passionate about what we do

thread.title: Oggi “Secrets of the Beehive” di David Sylvian compie 30 anni
thread.title_full: Oggi “Secrets of the Beehive” di David Sylvian compie 30 anni

posts.author: Simone Lucidi
posts.title: Oggi “Secrets of the Beehive” di David Sylvian compie 30 anni
posts.text:
Tweet 
Il 7 novembre del 1987 uscì “Secrets of the Beehive”di David Sylvian . 
Un album che ti fa sentire profondo ed ossessionato alla sola vista della sua copertina; una copertina composta da graffiti e impronte, tra scale di grigi, ed una piuma che un dì forse era stata usata per scrivere, come a dire che l’umanità in fondo lascia o lascerà dei segni. 
Il muro nel 1987 non era ancora stato abbattuto, ma nell’immaginario di David il tempo era già bloccato, sospeso in un incastro di arti, che non tenevano conto del tempo in cui erano, ma già raccontavano una costrizione dell’uomo dall’alto. 
“Secret of the Beehive” rimane attuale ancora oggi, nonostante l’odierna frenesia, proprio per questa ambientazione sonora fuori dal mondo. Questo è un album che indispone e protesta per quel violento tormento alla natura, madre non aver paura. Noi all’interno restiamo fermi tra dubbi e paure, oscurati dalla brama di possedere; alla fine qualcosa rimarrà, ma la nostra mano sarà vuota. 
David Sylvian è il manifesto dell’estrosità composta: cerca la pesantezza per narrare il vero senso del ciclo vitale, un enigma vivente. David sintetizza in questo album tutta la scena new wave e synth pop impegnata; ne sono la prova brani come “When poets dreamed of angels”, che con una semplice chitarra flamenca effettata ci accarezza il viso. Recita Sylvian nella valle incriminata, le macerie illuminate da un faro, la foschia si assottiglia, l’incrocio tribale è ancora vivo, osserviamo la metamorfosi e continuiamo ad ululare. 
“Orpheus” è il singolo dell’album e sentita oggi fa riflettere. Ascoltando questi effetti sgranati ad eco, si capisce da dove provenga la musica ovattata tanto di moda oggi. 
“Secrets of Beehive” contiene un’opera immortale: Forbidden Colours”, composta da Ryuchi Sakamoto e David Sylvian per la colonna sonora del film “Furyo”– 1983, con David Bowie protagonista ed alla regia Nagisa Oshima . Il brano nell’album è cantato da Sylvian , mentre nel film è inserita la sola melodia. “Forbidden Colours” cerca di schiudere la rigidità della cultura nipponica, che deve interiorizzare le diversità e tenerle nascoste, con quelle magiche note di Ryuchi che condiscono una cultura millenaria pronta al’evoluzione. Un brivido continuo quando si sente questo brano, diventato simbolo di un intero paese. 
Un vero peccato che, nel remaster dell’album del 2003, “Forbidden colours” non sia inclusa. 
David Sylvian – “Secrets of the Beehive” 
Data di pubblicazione: 7 novembre 1987 Tracce: 10 Lunghezza: LP 34.30 CD 40.31 Etichetta: Emi/Virgin Produttori: David Sylvian, Steve Nye 
Tracklist: 
2. The Boy with the Gun 3. Maria 5. The Devil’s Own 6. When Poets Dreamed of Angels 7. Mother and Child 8. Let the Happiness In 9. Waterfront

posts.title: (USA-KS-Burlington) Supervisor Engineer (Programs)
posts.text:
Wolf Creek Nuclear Operating Corporation Supervisor Engineer (Programs) in Burlington , Kansas 
THIS POSITION IS FOR INTERNAL CANDIDATES ONLY 
SUPERVISOR ENGINEER PROGRAMS 
Position Summary 
This position will plan and direct the activities of a group of component engineers responsible for providing engineering support to Operations and Maintenance, in addition to maintaining component programs in accordance with applicable regulatory and industry standards. This position requires teamwork and communication between Operations, Maintenance and Engineering due to the diverse nature of component and program requirements. This is the first line engineering supervisory position. 
Primary Duties and Responsibilities 
Plan, develop and direct engineering activities for subordinate personnel using prescribed methods and application of standard practices and techniques in various situations to support efficient plant operation, refueling and maintenance. 
Perform engineering overview function to assure the technical soundness of plant equipment and design to improve productivity and efficiency as well as minimization of radiation exposure to employees while maintaining the design of WCNOC’s license. 
Assure compliance with industry standards and regulatory commitments and guidelines. 
Perform, review and analyze technical problems and difficulties to advise the work group on the appropriate engineering alternatives. 
Influence subordinates, senior management, and department heads or outside contacts such as suppliers, consultants, regulatory personnel and representatives. 
Evaluate the progress of the staff and results obtained including making recommendations to achieve the main goals and objectives. 
Complete Performance Appraisals on subordinate personnel, plan and staffing of the work group and all related supervisory functions. 
Perform other duties as assigned by management. 
Summary of Requirements 
EDUCATION AND/OR EXPERIENCE: 
Minimum Regulatory Requirement: 
Regulatory Requirement: Tech Spec 5.3.1 [ANSI/ANS 3.1-1978] (underlined words are defined in referenced ANSI standard). Please contact Licensing prior to deviating from these requirements or if you have questions. 
Supervisor Engineers shall have a high school diploma or equivalent, and four years of experience in the craft or discipline he/she supervises. 
The regulatory requirement listed below applies to the responsible person (or group leader) in the discipline of Reactor Engineering. Other individuals with the job title of Supervisor Engineer that are not in this discipline are not impacted. 
Regulatory Requirement: Tech Spec 5.3.1 [ANSI/ANS 3.1-1978] (underlined words are defined in referenced ANSI standard). Please contact Licensing prior to deviating from these requirements or if you have questions. 
Additional WCNOC Requirements: 
This position requires a BS degree in an engineering field and five years of relevant experience or a MS degree in an engineering field and three years of relevant experience or a PhD in engineering and two years of relevant experience. 
Relevant experience is defined as professional level experience in engineering, engineering support or nuclear plant operations and support. Experience for this position should include above average leadership skills to work cross functionally throughout the organization influencing and affecting support for company initiatives. Excellent verbal and written communications skills are necessary. The ability to anticipate issues and to work with organizational units to avoid or mediate potential conflicts is an important skill. 
It is necessary to have demonstrated effective leadership by championing internal organizational processes including corrective actions, performance improvements, self assessments and human performance. The position requires strong problem solving skills and the ability to focus on essential elements of processes to develop appropriate improvement plans. Creativity and thinking outside-the-box are essential. Relevant experience will also involve a record of commitment to core values, organizational goals and key initiatives. 
Strong knowledge of plant operations and proven ability to create a positive nuclear safety culture are necessary. Attributes of a player-coach are desired. 
Certificates, Licenses, Registrations: 
Kansas Professional Engineers License and/or former SRO preferred. 
Additional Information: 
This position requires good oral and written communication skills. 
This position requires a satisfactory work record including good attendance. Note: This is a non-bargaining unit position. BOTH NON-BARGAINING UNIT AND BARGAINING UNIT EMPLOYEES ARE NCOURAGED TO APPLY DEADLINE FOR INTERNAL CANDIDATES IS 11/20/17

posts.text:
ごはんのおともと言えば…だるまだるま！ 
だるまだるまさんは、高崎の街中にあるおむすび屋さん。 おむすびといえば、ごはん。 その具となれば、ごはんに合わないわけないですね（＾＾） 
エキビレッジでも、2個、3個とまとめ買いする人も多い人気No.1の「おかか」 それだけでもおいしい「煮卵」（私はよくビビンパのトッピングにします） ビックリしちゃうほど肉感のある「そぼろ（ソイミート）」など “だるまだるまらしい”ごはんのおともを販売しています。 
真似して作ってみたけど、真似できない奥の深い味“おかか”

しかも、今月は「ごはんのおとも」特集♪ さらに張り切って準備してくれています。 先月から早速新作も登場！惣菜系も増えましたよ。 
いわしと野菜のアヒージョ
薄味なので家でちょっとアレンジしてもいいかも。 だるまだるま流・野菜のエスカベッシュと煮卵
野菜はその時の旬のものになります。 
そのほか、お弁当やおむすびも販売します。 通称「げんこつマフィン」も新味が加わり、選ぶ楽しさが増えました。 ざっくり系スコーンやクッキーもありますよ。（とんこ） 
通称「げんこつマフィン」
私のお気に入りはフルーツ×チョコの組み合わせ♪ 

【だるまだるま／高崎市】 11月24日（金）、25日（土）の2日間の出店◆ 
当日は、お弁当や おむすび、煮卵・おかかなどのごはんのおとも、スコーンやマフィンなどの焼き菓子、エキビレッジ限定スイーツ、オリジナルほうじ茶などを販売予定。

thread.title: Pierwszy projekt Ghelamco w Krakowie. To biurowiec .big spod kreski Q-arch
thread.title_full: Pierwszy projekt Ghelamco w Krakowie. To biurowiec .big spod kreski Q-arch

posts.title: Pierwszy projekt Ghelamco w Krakowie. To biurowiec .big spod kreski Q-arch
posts.text:
Drukuj Biura z własnymi tarasami, stacje do ładowania samochodów elektrycznych, parking rowerowy z prysznicami, powierzchnie usługowe – takie udogodnienia zaoferuje .big, biurowiec o powierzchni 10 tys. mkw., który powstaje w Krakowie u zbiegu ulic Generała Bohdana Zielińskiego i Kapelanka. Jest to pierwszy projekt Ghelamco w Krakowie. REKLAMA 
Budowa .big już się rozpoczęła. Biurowiec zaoferuje blisko 10 tys. mkw. powierzchni biurowej i 1,5 tys. mkw. powierzchni handlowej. big powstaje w doskonałej lokalizacji, niedaleko centrum, w sąsiedztwie pięknych terenów Parku Skały Twardowskiego i zalewu Zakrzówek. Zakończenie budowy przewidziano w połowie 2018 roku. 
– Nazwa projektu jest przewrotna. Nie odnosi się bowiem do rozmiaru budynku. Podkreśla za to potencjał jaki drzemie w Krakowie oraz w tej lokalizacji. Jestem przekonany, że .big stanie się miejscem, które będzie przyciągać wielkie talenty pracujące nad innowacyjnymi rozwiązaniami – mówi Jarosław Zagórski, dyrektor handlowy i rozwoju Ghelamco Poland. 
To kameralna inwestycja zaprojektowana przez krakowską pracownię architektoniczną Q-arch. Pięciopiętrowy biurowiec będzie się wyróżniać elegancką architekturą i nietypowymi rozwiązaniami. Najemcom zaoferuje łatwe w aranżacji biura (o powierzchni piętra ponad 2,1 tys. mkw.). Część firm będzie miała do dyspozycji własne tarasy. Dodatkowo na pierwszym piętrze, wewnątrz bryły budynku, powstanie patio, w którym będzie można zaaranżować mini ogród. Co więcej, do dyspozycji wszystkich użytkowników biurowca zostanie oddany blisko 200-metrowy taras na dachu, z którego rozciągać się będzie widok na Wawel. 
Wielką zaletą inwestycji jest lokalizacja, która pozwala na łatwy i szybki dostęp do ścisłego centrum, przy jednoczesnej bliskości jednego z najpiękniejszych terenów Krakowa – Parku Skały Twardowskiego i zalewu Zakrzówek. W pobliżu znajdują się także bulwary wiślane. Poza tym położenie .big zachęca do korzystania z komunikacji miejskiej i rowerów – dojazd do Starego Miasta nie zajmuje więcej niż 10 minut, a do lotniska Balice 25 minut. Biurowiec stanie w pobliżu tras rowerowych i stacji Wavelo. W samym budynku znajdzie się parking dla rowerzystów z prysznicami i szafkami. Użytkownikom samochodów .big zaoferuje 148 miejsc parkingowych w garażu podziemnym oraz dodatkowe 7 miejsc przed biurowcem. W budynku przewidziano też pięć stacji do ładowania samochodów elektrycznych. 
W poszukiwaniu najemców dewelopera projektu, Ghelamco Poland, wspierać będzie międzynarodowa firma doradcza Cushman & Wakefield.

thread.title: Saint-Jacques sur spaghetti à la crème de fenouil et de truffe
thread.title_full: Saint-Jacques sur spaghetti à la crème de fenouil et de truffe

posts.author: Sylviane Groniecki (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Saint-Jacques sur spaghetti à la crème de fenouil et de truffe
posts.text:
Une sauce parfumée, toute en douceur et finesse, pour un plat festif, qui devrait plaire à Claudine ( Cuisine de Gut ) pour qui j'ai cuisiner de saison 
Ingrédients pour   2   vagabonds   : 
8 noix de Saint-Jacques - 120 g de spaghetti - 1 bulbe de fenouil - 15 cl de crème épaisse - 3 cuillères à café d'huile de truffe - sel - poivre - huile d'olive - 1 cuillère à soupe de vinaigre balsamique - fleur de sel 

Préparation  : 
Nettoyer et émincer le fenouil Réserver un quart et cuire le reste 10 minutes à l'eau bouillante salée Égoutter et mixer avec la crème et l'huile de truffe Poivrer et réserver au chaud Faire chauffer un peu d'huile d'olive et y faire sauter le fenouil restant, avec le vinaigre balsamique pendant 5 minutes Cuire les pâtes à l'eau bouillante salée Égoutter et mélanger avec la crème de fenouil Poêler rapidement les noix de Saint-Jacques et les déposer sur les pâtes Poivrer et parsemer de fleur de sel Terminer avec les lamelles de fenouil sauté

thread.title: Human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) (Lot#0000120825; L | fxr agonists
thread.title_full: Human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) (Lot#0000120825; L | fxr agonists

posts.title: Human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) (Lot#0000120825; L | fxr agonists
posts.text:
Human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) (Lot#0000120825; L Posted on by admin 
Human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) (Lot#0000120825; Lonza®, Walkersville, MD, USA) were cultured at 37 °C and 5% CO2 in endothelial basal media (EBM-2) supplemented with a bullet kit (Lonza®) containing human fibroblast growth factor B, hydrocortisone, vascular endothelial growth factor, ascorbic acid, heparin, human 
Idelalisib ic50 endothelial growth factor, and fetal bovine serum. For cell passage, cultures were incubated to approximately 40% confluence within the culture flask, according to LONZA guidelines. For experiments, cultures were incubated to approximately 50% confluence then harvested by exposure to trypsin–EDTA (Lonza®) for 2 min at 37 °C. Cell suspensions were centrifuged at 201g for 5 min in a 5810R tabletop centrifuge (Eppendorf, 
Westbury, NY, USA), and resuspended in endothelial growth media at a concentration of 1.0 × 106 cells/mL in 1 mL aliquots maintained in 12 × 75 mm round bottom plastic tubes (VWR, Edmonton Canada) prior to experimentation. The dual fluorescent assay (SytoEB) www.selleckchem.com/products/SGI-1776.html uses a combination of two fluorescent dyes, Syto13 (Molecular Probes, Eugene, OR, USA) and ethidium bromide (EB) (Sigma–Aldrich, Mississauga, ON, Canada) to assess cell membrane integrity. Syto13 is a DNA/RNA binding stain that permeates all cells and fluoresces green on excitation by UV wavelengths. Ethidium bromide permeates cells with damaged plasma membranes, exhibiting red fluorescence upon UV exposure. The combination of these two dyes makes a binary assay with membrane intact cells exhibiting green fluorescence (Syto13) and membrane compromised cells exhibiting red fluorescence (EB). The SytoEB stain was prepared using 1× phosphate buffered saline (PBS), and aliquots of Syto and EB diluted from the stock solution. The final dye was comprised of 25 μM EB and 12.5 μM Syto13. 10 μL of the prepared dye were added to the 1 mL aliquot of HUVEC in suspension and incubated for 2 min at room temperature before analysis. The ratiometric dye 5′,6,6′-tetrachloro-1,1′,3,3′-tetraethylbenzimidazolylcarbocyanine-iodide 
(JC-1) (Molecular Probes, Eugene, OR, USA) was used as an indicator of mitochondrial membrane potential PIK3C2G of HUVEC in suspension. The fluorescence shifts from green (∼525 nm) in low polarization states (non-functional mitochondria) to red (∼590 nm) in high polarization states (functioning mitochondria). This change in color of fluorescence is based on a concentration-dependent shift from monomers of the dye which fluoresce green to J-aggregates which fluoresce red [34]. Initially the dye is present as cationic monomers (green) that permeate into cells, influenced by the negative intracellular potential. In healthy cells these monomers permeate into the mitochondrial matrix, drawn by the electronegative interior of mitochondria where these monomers form J-aggregates (red) [15]. This entry was posted in Uncategorized by admin . Bookmark the permalink . Leave a Reply Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked * Name

posts.author: Motiva Gente (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Corpo é encontrada às margens da BR-232 em Belo Jardim-PE
posts.text:
Na tarde desta segunda-feira (06/11) o corpo de um homem foi encontrado às margens da BR-232 próximo a entrada do Viana e Moura na cidade de Belo Jardim, Agreste de Pernambuco. 
De acordo com policiais a vítima não apresentava marcas de tiros ou facadas, o grupo de WhatsApp do Blog Se Liga Belo Jardim, começaram a circular várias fotos. A autoria e a motivação do crime até o presente momento são desconhecidos. O corpo foi encaminhado para o IML na cidade de Caruaru. 
Fonte: Se liga Belo Jardim

thread.title_full: ДОБРЫЕ СОСЕДИ «Стартинейджер». День первый

posts.title: ДОБРЫЕ СОСЕДИ «Стартинейджер». День первый
posts.text:
Фото: www.molodezh79.ru 
3 ноября – начало осенних каникул, это веселье, отдых и много новых приключений, которые ребята проведут вместе с « Добрыми соседями ». За неделю ребята окунутся в зажигательную программу « Стартинейджер », которую для них будет проводить специальный гость из Владивостока, директор городского конкурса танцев « Стартинейджер » и арт-проекта « LAKMUS », Будянский Максим. 
В рамках недельной смены ребята будут осваивать тренинги по психологии, лидерству и командообразованию, проходить практические занятия по технике танца, овладеют техникой уличного танца: Hip Hop, King Tut, паппинг, робот, посетят мастер-классы по жонглированию, а также насыщенная экскурсионная программа и многое другое. 
Ровно к 10:00 утра ребята отправились на вкусный завтрак, абсолютно все в предвкушении новых знакомств и знаний. Но это впереди. 
А сегодня в течение дня ребята знакомились. Играли в интеллектуальную игру, постигая тайны и ребусы различных городов, поближе знакомясь с географией всего мира, которую провела Башкатова Любовь. Затем узнали немного исторических фактов о появлении Дня национального единства в Российской Федерации, а также приняли активное участие в Хороводе Единства. 
После обеда отряды разделились и отправились по отрядным местам проводить игры на сплочение, выявлять творческие таланты. Спустя время все три отряда отправились на поиски загадочного клада, который искали дружной сплоченной командой. 
Это только начало. Все самое интересное нас ждет впереди!

posts.author: Blog altamiradomara.blogspot.com (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: A casa caiu! Pol鱈cia apreende 22 quilos de coca鱈na e prende traficantes de Santa In棚s
posts.text: Jeisael Marx A casa caiu! Polícia apreende 22 Kg de cocaína e prende traficantes de Santa Inês A Polícia Civil após investigação de oito meses, deflagrou a "Operação Jogadores", com a finalidade de prender uma organização criminosa de assaltantes de carga e narcotraficantes, na cidade de Santa Inês. Os policiais conseguiram interceptar uma carga de pasta base de cocaína avaliada em meio milhão de reais e prender seis integrantes da organização criminosa em São Luís, em cumprimento aos mandados de prisão preventiva. Os presos foram identificados como Leonardo de Sousa Gonzaga, 23 anos; Joab da Silva Tavares, 24 anos; José Carlos Matos Pereira, 25 anos; Leonilson de Souza Gonzaga, 21 anos; Leandro Soeiro de Souza, 35 anos; e Ericlenes Moraes Cruz, 32 anos. Os conduzidos são integrantes de uma quadrilha responsável por vários assaltos a cargas de fertilizantes, combustível, cerveja, no Maranhão e em outros estados, além do tráfico interestadual de drogas. Foram apreendidos com a organização criminosa 22 quilos de pasta base cocaína, um caminhão Mercedes, com carreta, além de três carros. Postado

thread.title: Sisk wins £49m civils deal for new Cambridgeshire town
thread.title_full: Sisk wins £49m civils deal for new Cambridgeshire town

posts.author: 3dpersonnelblog
posts.title: Sisk wins £49m civils deal for new Cambridgeshire town
posts.text:
November 7, 2017 3dpersonnelblog British construction new , Construction news , Featured Content 0 Reading Time: 1 minute John Sisk and Son has won a £49m deal to build the infrastructure for a new 10,000-home town planned outside Cambridge. 
The Homes and Communities Agency chose Sisk to deliver the infrastructure for its flagship Northstowe development, earmarked for the site of the Royal Airforce’s Oakington base 10 km north of Cambridge. 
The package of works includes over 4 km of road construction, including a new link road from the A14 and bespoke connections between the town and the Cambridge Guided Busway. 
Other work will see infrastructure installed to support gas, water and electricity networks for the town, as well as groundworks to prepare land for a school planned for the area. 
The town will be directly linked to the UK’s strategic road network when the £1.5bn A14 upgrade between Cambridge and Huntingdon is completed in 2020. 
The 10,000-home Northstowe development – dubbed “Cambridgeshire’s newest town” – will be delivered by five major housebuilders: Barratt, Bloor, Bovis, Linden and Taylor Wimpey. 
Bloor Homes has already started building phase one of the project, with the remaining four housebuilders expected to have started on site by the end of the year. 
All 10,000 homes are scheduled to be completed by spring 2019. 
The HCA has pledged to ensure just under half of the homes at Northstowe are affordable. 
HCA strategic land general manager Terry Fuller said: “The HCA is investing to enable vital infrastructure work to take place at Northstowe and this commission is an important step, as it will unlock the delivery of much-needed new homes in an area of high housing demand.” 
  https://www.constructionnews.co.uk/projects/contracts/sisk-wins-49m-civils-deal-for-new-cambridgeshire-town/10025043.article?blocktitle=News&contentID=14653 Share this:
